== Kizhuparamba (CT) (627465) ==

Kizhuparamba (CT) is a town in the [[Ernad]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 15 sq. km. and harbouring 4500 households with total population of 22062 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 435 km. Male population is 10810 and female population is 11252. Scheduled Caste population is 1921 and Scheduled Tribes population is 42. Census Location Code of the town is 627465<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 35 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 35 km.
